
Subject: Your shared hosting account has expired

Hello %%%FIRST_NAME%%%,

Your shared hosting account has expired %%%EXPIRED_DAYS%%% days ago, on the:
%%%EXPIRATION_DATE%%%.

Please login into your control panel at

%%%DTC_CLIENT_URL%%%

with your login %%%DTC_ADM_LOGIN%%%, click on "my account", and renew it.

We will keep your shared account up few days to give you the time to
renew your contract.

%%%SIGNATURE%%%
